r.d: This extension provides an IBM database driver for PDO. This driver supports IBM DB2 Universal Database, IBM Cloudscape, Apache Derby databases and IDS (Informix Data Server).
r.n: - Support for PHP 8.3 - Support for boolean data type (IBM i 7.5, Db2/LUW 9.6) - Fix incorrect buffer size for SQLBindParameter (causing -902 otherwise) - Fix error handling for IBM i attributes - Improve error reporting when SQLGetDiagRec fails - Build system improvements for finding driver library - CI and test suite improvements
